nodes.text: A gimer stick was a type of walking stick. The Jedi Yoda was given a gimer stick as a gift from the Wookiees. Yoda used a gimer stick while serving on the Jedi High Council and later as Grand Master of the Jedi Order on Coruscant and during his exile on the planet Dagobah.
The gimer stick also had nutritious juices inside that eased thirst and acted as a natural painkiller.
